content.rendered: I Love Living is a practical, powerful book for effective living. The contents of this book are taken from spontaneous speeches delivered by Rajan in his “Wisdom” sessions. Each speech is a thought- provoking tool to spark your life.

excerpt.rendered: I Love Living is a practical, powerful book for effective living. The contents of this book are taken from spontaneous speeches delivered by Rajan in his “Wisdom” sessions. Each speech is a thought- provoking tool to spark your life.
